elements.text:
We're really struggling with an error:

src\main\java\com\example\AuthenticationFilter.java:38: error: method does not override or implement a method from a supertype
    @Override
    ^

We're following the
line by line, but for some reason it just won't recognize the @Override annotation in this context:
Has anyone run into something similar? Has anyone completed a successful user registration and login feature and have some tips?

text:
okay, I think I solved it.

Had to do with our dependencies  & our spring boot version (3.1 vs 3.2); we were importing HttpServletRequest from javax.etcetera instead of from jakarta.etcetera

I'll leave this up in case anyone else runs into this

text: Glad you were able to solve it! :heartpulse:
